@skillet92 
really sorry about the above comment...
this mp4 seemed quite odd...

LOL. Sorry. Non-standard 320p means 320 pixels height. I have decided to put in the name to EMHASIZE NON-COMPAIBILITY WITH HANDHELDS
If DAR is 16/9, width is 576 pixels and height is 320 pixels.
If DAR is 2.35/1 (theatrical aspect ratio) width is 576 pixels but height s 256  pixels.
SAR is always 1/1 and hardcoded in video.
PAR is always 1/1 in my encodes.

Sorry. I just changes keyboard battery.

So, I am sure that many do not understand.
However, same people have problems with 360p, with 480p, with 720p and with 272p currently "on hold", with mp4, with my screen-name, with my writing, with my flag, with my imperfect English.

Here is the deal - maybe I'll choose 432p - maybe 400p - who can tell?
I can explain and choose not to. Take it or leave it.
LOL, it doesn't help. I'll switch to fve-six years old but plain keyboard.

this is really thought to understand
hehhehe
:)

@houruoha: LOL, batteries too?
Seriously. frikkin Genius wireless keyboard ate batteries in three weeks. Bad ones in two. I stopped to use wireless mouse - 'cause he ate cells in one week. Well, this wireless crap was a gift, a present from our ISP to all suckers maybe two Xmases ago. Circle has been closed, now I use same ole' as before, and keyboard - sucks anyhow.

@ TPB MODERATORS particularly - I don't understand why you can't understand that size is irrelevant and that goes for pixels and files.

I have NEVER come across a 20-40 file that isn't compatible on ANY device mentioned. I have loaded numerous movies and won't bother giving names BUT will if asked. 
They ALL look great on a 32" LCD w/HDMI from a PS3 and on an iPod.

Stop trying to pigeon hole with your outdated 'handheld' crap. You (MODERATORS) complete MORONS!

Have you had even one complaint from a REAL fan. What are you basing your judgements on. I could go on but what is the point with you idiots.

@ ALL - just stop whining! Seriously you're so boring. Go elsewhere if you don't understand or like what you see.

Yeah,you guys lost me.I just wanted to say that
this episode was excellent and very thought
provoking.
You can get back to your discussion now.LOL

@ All non-moderator fans of 20-40.
Firstly, my apologies to any FAN I may have upset by my comments. 
The primary part was aimed ONLY at moderators on TPB.
The last part about 'whining' was aimed at the haters - they know who they are; NOT at fans who are curious and willing to ask polite intelligent questions.

Jon
